response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I estimate its true worth to be $12,000. However, I understand your perspective and would like to make it more accessible for you. Therefore, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and comes with a satisfaction guarantee, ensuring that you will find the product meets or exceeds your expectations. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 9500}
